main event: An Air Force officer observed an unidentified flying object near Seoul, South Korea on 24 February 1952.
interesting points: The object was described as elongated and glowing, measuring about 45 feet in length,The object hovered before accelerating steeply and disappearing within 2 to 3 seconds,Weak electronic signals were detected during the incident,The sighting was made at an altitude of around 2000 feet and heading 270 degrees,The object might resemble a surface-to-air guided missile.
